name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in **Kotlin** and **Spring Boot** for building scalable and high-performance applications. My technical expertise includes implementing **event-driven architectures** and working with **Pub/Sub systems** and **event streaming** to enhance system responsiveness and efficiency. I have a strong focus on data storage strategies, ensuring **data accuracy** and the performance of **OLAP systems** for analytics purposes. 

My background in **infrastructure as code** allows me to efficiently provision cloud resources, optimizing deployment processes. I excel in **query optimization** and designing systems that prioritize scalability and performance under varying loads. I am a collaborative problem-solver who thrives in fast-paced environments, leveraging best practices to deliver innovative solutions. 

Additionally, I have a proven track record in full-stack development utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, and have hands-on experience with **cloud platforms** such as **Azure** and **AWS**. My robust background in CI/CD automation, combined with experience in AI/ML integration for intelligent solutions, positions me as a versatile asset to any software development team.
